TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Niger, title = Niger, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Niger} }

S.FORM: Niger Itini i 16 00 N, 8 00 E, noAfilika ko Niger. Polong no sekalay i 1.267 million sq km "saka 22 ko rayray no ngangan. " "O sekalay no sera i, 1,266,700 sq km, no nanom a sekalay i, 300 sq km " Polong i 18,638,600 ko tamdaw. sera Masakilac ko sera o malo kakaomahen a sera 35.10%, Malo no kilakilangan a sera 1%, malo no roma to a sera 63.90%. siyoto O (((Niamey)) ko Siyoto. katomirengan no kitakit a romi'ad Pihiratengan no kitakit a romi'ad i sakatosa ko safaw 18 a romi'ad. O Sawara'an no kitakit anini i ci Mahamadou Issoufou , patirengan a romi'ad i 2011 a miheca saka 4 folad saka 7 a romi'ad. Pi'arawan to lakaw CIA 外交部

Niger Itini i 16 00 N, 8 00 E, noAfilika ko Niger. Polong no sekalay i 1.267 million sq km "saka 22 ko rayray no ngangan. " "O sekalay no sera i, 1,266,700 sq km, no nanom a sekalay i, 300 sq km " Polong i 18,638,600 ko tamdaw. sera Masakilac ko sera o malo kakaomahen a sera 35.10%, Malo no kilakilangan a sera 1%, malo no roma to a sera 63.90%. siyoto O (((Niamey)) ko Siyoto. katomirengan no kitakit a romi'ad Pihiratengan no kitakit a romi'ad i sakatosa ko safaw 18 a romi'ad. O Sawara'an no kitakit anini i ci Mahamadoo Issoofoo , patirengan a romi'ad i 2011 a miheca saka 4 folad saka 7 a romi'ad. Pi'arawan to lakaw CIA 外交部
